info.description: Below is the documentation for the API calls. You can try them out right here.
info.title: Fun Generators API

get.description: Get a Trivia entry for a given id. Retrieves a trivia question and answer based on the id.

parameters.description: ID of the trivia to fetch
parameters.name: id

get.description: Get a random trivia for a given category(optional)

parameters.description: Category to get the trivia from
parameters.name: category

get.description: Search for random trivia which has the text in the query, for a given category(optional).

parameters.description: Text to search for in the trivia
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Category to get the trivia from
parameters.name: category
